snippet.title: Heroes of Eternal Quest Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to a never-ending adventure full of challenges. Gather resources, build all sorts of buildings, unlock mysterious cards, and lead a group of heroes destined for greatness. Explore the unknown, climb the Tower of Shards, and break free from a destiny we never chose.

Full game is available on Steam now!
